name: Sweet Garlic Chicken
description: Epic sheet pan recipe with chicken and yam and a magic sweet and gooey sauce! This is a terrific back pocket dinner you’ll love to put on repeat.
preparation: Preheat oven to 450° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Meanwhile, cut sweet potatoes into small cubes, you should have about 3 cups.
In a large bowl, add sweet potatoes, oil, chicken, and seasoning. Toss until well-coated.
Arrange chicken and sweet potatoes on Sheet Pan. Roast 16–18 min, or until cooked through.
tips: Make it vegan: Replace chicken with 1 lb (450 g) medium-firm tofu, cubed.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy green salad and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing, your choice.
